name: Basic
description: Access to the club facilities during off-peak hours
advantage: Low cost, perfect for occasional visitors

name: Standard
description: Access to the club facilities during peak hours
advantage: Great for frequent visitors and weekend warriors

name: Premium
description: Access to the club facilities during peak hours and discounts on club events
advantage: Ideal for fitness enthusiasts and those who attend club events regularly

name: VIP
description: Access to the club facilities at all times, discounts on club events, and priority booking for club amenities
advantage: The ultimate membership option for VIP treatment and access to all club amenities
